ModIndicator.ModTypeDef.label: Default Framework - Required
ModIndicator.ModTypeDef.description: This mod is a framework essential for assembly.

ModIndicator.ModTypeDef.label: Compatible Framework
ModIndicator.ModTypeDef.description: This mod is third party framework. It has been tested for assembly compatibility.

ModIndicator.ModTypeDef.label: Default - Required
ModIndicator.ModTypeDef.description: The mod is included in the assembly and is critical to the game.

ModIndicator.ModTypeDef.label: Default - Optional
ModIndicator.ModTypeDef.description: The mod is included in the default HSK assembly, but is optional.

ModIndicator.ModTypeDef.label: Native Addon
ModIndicator.ModTypeDef.description: The mod has been made specifically for HSK by a Third-Party.

ModIndicator.ModTypeDef.label: Conversion Addon
ModIndicator.ModTypeDef.description: The mod is a converted version of an existing mod, made to work with HSK.

ModIndicator.ModTypeDef.label: Workshop Mod - Fully Compatible
ModIndicator.ModTypeDef.description: The mod has been tested for compatibility and is fully compatible with the assembly.

ModIndicator.ModTypeDef.label: Workshop Mod - Compatible
ModIndicator.ModTypeDef.description: The mod is partially compatible. Modification Needed - Mods requiring balance and conversions to work with HSK.

ModIndicator.ModTypeDef.label: Workshop Mod - Incompatible
ModIndicator.ModTypeDef.description: The mod has been tested for compatibility and is guaranteed to break your game.

ModIndicator.ModTypeDef.label: Unknown Compatibility
ModIndicator.ModTypeDef.description: The compatibility of this mod is not known (Default Option when not set).

ModIndicator.ModTypeDef.label: Patch
ModIndicator.ModTypeDef.description: Single patch or small patch set.

ModIndicator.ModTypeDef.label: End Mod - No Mods Below These
ModIndicator.ModTypeDef.description:
Just don't place mods below.

These are always last:

- RuntimeGC
- Dubs Performance Analyzer
- Wikirim
- PerformanceOptimiser
- Rocketman
